name: Sieve
long_description:
Video has become a core component to some of the most consequential industries in the world including social, communications, art, robotics, and VR.

But the processing of it, especially with AI, is incredibly complex due to the number of use cases that exist and the types of systems that need to be built for each one of them.

Sieve's mission is to supply the infrastructure needed to understand, manipulate, and generate video, so we can accelerate all future applications of it.
